overall_assessment.purpose: Handles contact forms, email subscriptions, unsubscribe functionality, and Discord signups with Supabase integration
overall_assessment.business_impact: Critical for user engagement and lead capture - enables contact forms, newsletter subscriptions, and Discord community onboarding
overall_assessment.architecture_notes: Well-structured class-based approach with proper separation of concerns. Uses modern ES6+ features and async/await patterns
overall_assessment.integration_points: Integrates with Supabase backend, Discord webhooks, and DOM event handling across multiple form types
overall_assessment.risk_assessment: Low risk - good error handling and validation present. Some debug logging in production code

file_analyses.feedback: Debug console.log statements should be removed from production code (lines 169, 177, 198, 354, 358, 414). Consider adding more robust email validation and rate limiting for form submissions.

classes.name: ContactAPI
classes.purpose: Main class handling all form interactions and Supabase communication
classes.design_assessment: Well-designed with clear method separation and proper error handling patterns
classes.feedback: Remove debug logging and consider adding input sanitization

methods.name: constructor
methods.purpose: Initializes Supabase client and sets up form listeners
methods.logic_assessment: Clean initialization with proper configuration handling

methods.name: getConfig
methods.purpose: Retrieves configuration from window variables or meta tags

methods.name: setupForms
methods.purpose: Attaches event listeners to various form types
methods.logic_assessment: Clean event listener setup with proper form selection

methods.name: handleContact
methods.logic_assessment: Good error handling and user feedback with Discord integration

methods.name: handleSubscription
methods.logic_assessment: Proper duplicate handling and error management

methods.name: handleUnsubscribe
methods.feedback: Remove debug console.log statements on lines 169, 177, 198

methods.name: handleDiscordSignup
methods.logic_assessment: Complex but well-structured with proper validation and auto-redirect functionality

methods.name: showMessage
methods.purpose: Displays form feedback messages to users

methods.name: sendDiscordNotification
methods.feedback: Remove debug console.log statements on lines 354, 358, 414

overall_assessment.purpose: Main landing page for Asabaal Ventures website with hero section, navigation, and contact forms
overall_assessment.business_impact: Primary entry point for visitors - crucial for first impressions and user conversion
overall_assessment.architecture_notes: Modern responsive design with inline CSS, proper semantic HTML structure
overall_assessment.integration_points: Connects to contact forms JavaScript, external Supabase CDN, and Discord webhook functionality
overall_assessment.risk_assessment: Low risk - standard HTML structure with modern web practices

overall_assessment.purpose: Blog listing page displaying published articles with navigation and responsive layout
overall_assessment.business_impact: Content hub for thought leadership and SEO - important for organic traffic and audience engagement
overall_assessment.architecture_notes: Consistent styling with main site, proper semantic markup for blog content
overall_assessment.integration_points: Links to individual blog posts, maintains consistent navigation with main site
overall_assessment.risk_assessment: Low risk - static content presentation with standard web practices

recommendations: Remove all debug console.log statements from production JavaScript code
Consider implementing rate limiting for form submissions to prevent spam
Add input sanitization for form data before database insertion
Consider moving inline CSS to external stylesheets for better maintainability
Add proper error tracking/monitoring for production debugging
